select shpl.ht_pro_line_id,shpl.pro_line_id,shpl.pro_code, shpl.pro_name, shpl.pro_desc, shpl.factory_id,f.factory_name as factoryName, shpl.work_shop_id, ws.work_shop_name as workShopName,shpl.status, shpl.create_user_id, u.user_name as createUserName,shpl.create_time, shpl.modified_user_id,s.user_name as modifiedUserName,shpl.modified_time from fantech_imes.smt_ht_pro_line shpl left join ocean.sys_user u on shpl.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on shpl.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.smt_factory f on shpl.factory_id=f.factory_id left join fantech_imes.smt_work_shop ws on shpl.work_shop_id= ws.work_shop_id
1=1

and shpl.pro_code like CONCAT('%', #{proCode}, '%')
and shpl.pro_name like CONCAT('%', #{proName}, '%')
and shpl.pro_desc like CONCAT('%', #{proDesc}, '%')
